name: Snowball Fight (Tycrate1)
description:
This is a game I made in 5 hours for fun!!!

I followed a tutorial on it by gamesplusjames on YouTube here is the link to his channel

gamesplusjames YouTube channel - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyBsvsU7uiurMiBZIYXvnyg

Player 1 - A and D to move W to jump and F to shoot

Player 2 - Right Arrow and Left Arrow to move Up Arrow to jump and Enter to shoot

Other controls - R to restart and M to go to Main Menu

Hope you enjoy!!!
